title: ClickGuard
subtitle: Phishing training SAAS (Freelance)
description: Software as a Service for small and medium companies to provide security awareness training for employees. It includes 7 modules related to phishing identification and awareness, automated phishing simulated campaigns with GoPhish and an Admin dashboard for consulting campaigns, results and metrics.

title: Instituto HAS
subtitle: Education web app for a school in Jalisco (Freelance)
description: Implemented a web application for a school in Jalisco where the main requirement was to automate most important processes that were previously manual. Students can take their modules self-paced, take their test and pay modules online with Stipe. Administrators have al kind of information and metrics to ensure correct functionality of school and web platform. (Images hosted in AWS)

title: ConnectMate
subtitle: Software as a Service for call centers (School Project)
description: Software as a Service made with AWS infraestructure for improving Call Centers daily operations and initial employee training, reducing operations costs and hiring/training processes with help of KPI's.
